textAfterTable: Baby Got Feedback...Product Reviews Leave feedback! I had no idea about this product until I was trying on my wedding dress and I said to my MOH, "It looks like I have no butt in this dress", and she says "Buy a padded panty". I did some research and found Bubbles Bodywear. I got to say not only was I 100% satisfied with the product, it gave me a natural looking butt without looking over dramatic which I did not want, but I am 100% satisfied with the customer service. I must have called 3 or 4 times and every time the ladies that attended me were very friendly, and very helpful. Shipping was EXTREMELY fast! Wow! I wish I could post photos to show you but have no fear this is a great product and a wonderful company. I am very happy I made this purchase with them. -Diana, NJ The best thing that ever happened to me!! Lol i got the clear silicone pads with the padded bikini panty and boyshort and i love them both!!
